short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently manage time with our web extension's intuitive interface, featuring tracking, limits, history, permissions and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Web Browser Screen Time Monitoring App is designed to help users monitor and manage their screen time usage while browsing the internet. This web-based application aims to promote healthy habits and reduce digital addiction by providing users with insights into their screen time habits and tools to manage their usage.
